data.meta_description: Example Suricata rules implementing some of my detection tactics - suricata-rules/LICENSE at master · michalpurzynski/suricata-rules
data.text:

1. Definitions

1.2. "Contributor Version"

1.4. "Covered Software"

1.8. "License"

(b) any new file in Source Code Form that contains any Covered

Software.
